holidays.name: Hug holiday - International Body Piercing Day
holidays.description: A day to appreciate the art and culture of body piercing, celebrating self-expression and adornment through piercings worldwide.
holidays.origin: Started by body piercing enthusiasts and professionals to raise awareness about the body modification community.
holidays.funFact: Body piercing dates back thousands of years, with evidence from ancient civilizations including the Egyptians, Romans, and Mayans.

holidays.name: Tau Day
holidays.description: Dedicated to tau, the circle constant equal to 2Ï€. Advocates argue tau simplifies many formulas in math and physics compared to pi.
